original: intros l. induction l using lb_ortho_ind. - apply lb_mask_equiv_trans with (l ++ nil) l l. + rewrite lb_mask_equiv_refl, lb_mask_equiv_app, lb_meet_eq. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. * apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. + apply lb_mask_equiv_refl. - apply lb_ortho_cons_inv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply in_lb_ortho_2 in H1. contradiction.
